inmyopenshift.cloud

The aim of this project and its authors is to bring to OpenShift platform a bunch of templates for deploying in the more easier way existing applications.

http://gogs.inmyopenshift.cloud

08 Oct 2016

Gogs (Go Git Service) is a painless self-hosted Git service. It's an independent binary distribution across ALL platforms that Go supports.
